docs.snippet: Transportation officials said they believed a contractor had dumped a massive mound of dirt that might have shifted the ground beneath an Interstate 495 bridge in Wilmington....
docs.lead_paragraph: Transportation officials said they believed a contractor had dumped a massive mound of dirt that might have shifted the ground beneath an Interstate 495 bridge in Wilmington.
docs.abstract: Delaware transportation officials say they believe contractor Jim Thomas dumped a massive mound of dirt, over several years, that may have shifted the ground beneath an Interstate 495 bridge in Wilmington, causing it to tilt and forcing its closing.

headline.main: Delaware: Contractor’s Action Is Said to Force Bridge’s Closing
